metadata.description: Platinum Grit Chapters 1-5, in which the fearless Nils and the timid-but-still-surprisingly-together Jeremy take on the Zodiac (they win); Jer's insane Scottish relatives (they sort of win); a 1940s private dick (they draw when poor light stops play); and two sets of alien matchmakers (they almost). Rated PG: Contains Humour, Moderate Scots Accents and Implicit Sex. [And some paranormal nudity-though obviously not enough.]
metadata.name: Platinum Grit
